name: Lashychat
tagline: A Phoenix/React/Websockets chat system built for RP.
body:
# Lashychat

An earnest attempt to build an RP-oriented chat system from scratch using modern tools.

For now, this is just a side project to learn React, Elixir, Phoenix, and Websockets.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
